headline: Mondelez, PepsiCo among companies dominating junk-food advertising before 9pm watershed, study says
summary: Pertaining to the UK, The Food Foundation also pulled out Mars, Haribo and Kellogg for adverts that could influence children.

headline: Pepsi swaps out burger chain soda orders in brand’s latest video stunt
summary: “Undercover Cups” shows reps going into McDonald’s, Burger King and Wendy’s — all Coke partners — to replace soft drink orders with Pepsi.

raw.headline: Pepsi swaps out burger chain soda orders in brand’s latest video stunt
raw.summary: “Undercover Cups” shows reps going into McDonald’s, Burger King and Wendy’s — all Coke partners — to replace soft drink orders with Pepsi.

headline: One Stock I've Been Buying This Month And One I'm Looking To Buy
summary: PepsiCo and Realty Income experienced price drops. Read why PEP and O's suppressed share prices could reward patient investors with solid upside.
